title: .NET 8.0 Breaking Changes
description: Breaking changes introduced in .NET 8.0 across all technology areas

breaks.title: Rate-limiting middleware requires AddRateLimiter
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where rate-limiting middleware now requires AddRateLimiter to be called on app startup.

breaks.title: IFormFile parameters require anti-forgery checks
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where minimal APIs that consume IFormFile or IFormFileCollection parameters require anti-forgery checks.

breaks.title: ConcurrencyLimiterMiddleware is obsolete
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where ConcurrencyLimiterMiddleware has been obsoleted.

breaks.title: Forwarded Headers Middleware ignores X-Forwarded-* headers from unknown proxies
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core where Forwarded Headers Middleware now ignores headers from proxies that aren't explicitly configured as trusted.

breaks.title: HTTP logging middleware requires AddHttpLogging()
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where HTTP logging middleware now requires AddHttpLogging() to be called.

breaks.title: ISystemClock is obsolete
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where ISystemClock and constructors that use it have been marked obsolete.

breaks.title: Custom converters for serialization removed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where 'ValidationProblemDetails' and 'ProblemDetails' no longer use custom converters.

breaks.title: Security token events return a JsonWebToken
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where the JwtBearer, WsFederation, and OpenIdConnect events context properties of type 'SecurityToken' now return a 'JsonWebToken' by default.

breaks.title: TrimMode defaults to full for Web SDK projects
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 8.0 where 'TrimMode' defaults to 'full' for Web SDK projects.

breaks.title: New non-root 'app' user in Linux images
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in containers where a new non-root 'app' user was added in Linux container images.

breaks.title: Default ASP.NET Core port changed from 80 to 8080
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in containers where the default ASP.NET Core port changed from 80 to 8080.

breaks.title: 'ca-certificates' package removed from Alpine images
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in containers where the 'ca-certificates' package was removed from Alpine container images.

breaks.title: Debian container images upgraded to Debian 12
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in containers where .NET container images for Linux have been upgraded to Debian 12 (Bookworm).

breaks.title: Kerberos package removed from Alpine and Debian images
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in containers where the 'krb5-libs' package was removed from .NET container images.

breaks.title: 'libintl' package removed from Alpine images
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in containers where the 'libintl' package was removed from Alpine container images.

breaks.title: Multi-platform container tags are Linux-only
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in containers where multi-platform container tags are now Linux-only.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: Activity operation name when null
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the operation name of an Activity is stored as an empty string if it's specified as null when the activity is created.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: AnonymousPipeServerStream.Dispose behavior for HandleInheritability.Inheritable
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the behavior of AnonymousPipeServerStream.Dispose has changed for servers that are created for out-of-proc communication.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: Boolean-backed enum type support removed
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where support for parsing, formatting, and conversions of Boolean-backed enumeration types has been removed.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: Complex.ToString format changed to `<a; b>`
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the Complex.ToString() format changed from `(a, b)` to `<a; b>`.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: Legacy Console.ReadKey removed
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the legacy Console.ReadKey implementation has been removed.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 methods ignore whitespace
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 and Base64.DecodeFromUtf8InPlace methods ignore whitespace in the input.

breaks.title: Drive's current directory path enumeration
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where files are enumerated without a separator after the path when the path is the drive's current directory.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: Enumerable.Sum throws new OverflowException for some inputs
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where Enumerable.Sum can throw new OverflowException exceptions for certain inputs.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: Backslash mapping in Unix file paths
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the CoreCLR native runtime no longer maps backslashes to forward slashes in file paths on Unix.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: FileStream writes when pipe is closed
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where an exception is thrown if you write to a FileStream whose underlying pipe is closed.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: GetFolderPath behavior on Unix
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the behavior of Environment.GetFolderPath has changed on Unix.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: GC.GetGeneration might return Int32.MaxValue
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where GC.GetGeneration might return Int32.MaxValue for certain object types.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: GetSystemVersion no longer returns ImageRuntimeVersion
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where RuntimeEnvironment.GetSystemVersion no longer returns ImageRuntimeVersion, which is a .NET Framework-oriented value.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: ITypeDescriptorContext nullable annotations
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the nullable annotations on three ITypeDescriptorContext properties have changed.

breaks.title: TrustedCertificatesDirectory and StartNewTlsSessionContext are not available on .NET Standard / .NET Framework
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where TrustedCertificatesDirectory and StartNewTlsSessionContext are not available when targeting .NET Standard 2.0.

breaks.title: .NET 8 obsoletions with custom IDs
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some APIs have been marked as obsolete with a custom diagnostic ID.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: Method builders generate parameters with HasDefaultValue set to false
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder now generate method parameters with HasDefaultValue set to false.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: ProcessStartInfo.WindowStyle honored when UseShellExecute is false
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where ProcessStartInfo.WindowStyle is now honored even when UseShellExecute is false.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: RuntimeIdentifier returns platform for which the runtime was built
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where RuntimeInformation.RuntimeIdentifier returns the platform for which the runtime was built.

breaks.title: Package part URIs are now compared case-insensitively in System.IO.Packaging
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where System.IO.Packaging now compares package part URIs case-insensitively to align with the OPC specification.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: FindSystemTimeZoneById doesn't return new object
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById doesn't return a new TimeZoneInfo object.

breaks.title: .NET 8 breaking change: 'Type.GetType' throws exception for all invalid element types
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where 'Type.GetType' throws a TypeLoadException for all invalid element types.

breaks.title: AesGcm authentication tag size on macOS
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in cryptography where AesGcm on macOS only supports 16-byte (128-bit) authentication tags.

breaks.title: RSA.EncryptValue and RSA.DecryptValue are obsolete
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in cryptography where RSA.EncryptValue and RSA.DecryptValue are marked obsolete.

breaks.title: .NET Monitor only includes distroless images
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in deployment in .NET 8 where the .NET Monitor 8 image offering only includes distroless images.

breaks.title: Host determines RID-specific assets
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in deployment in .NET 8 where the runtime host looks for RID-specific assets via a known list.

breaks.title: StripSymbols defaults to true
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in deployment where the default value for 'StripSymbols' is now 'true' for 'PublishAOT'.

breaks.title: ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance behaves consistently
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance behaves consistently regardless of the order of constructor overloads.

breaks.title: ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance requires non-null provider
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance throws an ArgumentNullException if the provider is null.

breaks.title: System.Formats.Cbor DateTimeOffset formatting change
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where System.Formats.Cbor always formats and parses DateTimeOffset values using the invariant culture.

breaks.title: ConfigurationBinder throws for mismatched value
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where ConfigurationBinder throws an exception if ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration is true and a config value doesn't match the model value.

breaks.title: ConfigurationManager package no longer references System.Security.Permissions
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where the System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager package no longer references the System.Security.Permissions package.

breaks.title: Empty keys added to dictionary by configuration binder
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where empty keys are now added to dictionary types by the configuration binder.

breaks.title: DirectoryServices package no longer references System.Security.Permissions
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where the System.DirectoryServices package no longer references the System.Security.Permissions package.

breaks.title: ManagementDateTimeConverter.ToDateTime returns a local time
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where the DateTime returned by ManagementDateTimeConverter.ToDateTime is based on local time.

breaks.title: FromKeyedServicesAttribute.Key can be null
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where FromKeyedServicesAttribute.Key is now nullable to support unkeyed services and inheritance.

breaks.title: HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args respected by HostApplicationBuilder ctor
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in .NET extensions where the HostApplicationBuilder constructor respects the HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args value even if DisableDefaults is true.

breaks.title: TwoDigitYearMax default is 2049
breaks.description: Learn about the globalization breaking change in .NET 8 where the default value of the TwoDigitYearMax property for Gregorian calendars has changed from 2029 to 2049.

breaks.title: Date and time converters honor culture argument
breaks.description: Learn about the globalization breaking change in .NET 8 where the type converters for date and time types use the argument-specified culture to format the date and time.

breaks.title: CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap only unwraps on target instance
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in interop in .NET 8 where 'GetOrCreateObjectForComInstance()' with the 'CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap' flag only unwraps wrappers from the target 'ComWrappers' instance.

breaks.title: IDispatchImplAttribute API is removed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in interop in .NET 8 where the IDispatchImplAttribute API has been removed.

breaks.title: JSFunctionBinding implicit public default constructor removed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in interop in .NET 8 where the implicit public default constructor for System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.JSFunctionBinding was removed.

breaks.title: Linux native library resolution no longer uses `netcoredeps`
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where Linux applications no longer search the `netcoredeps` subdirectory for native libraries.

breaks.title: Custom marshallers require additional members
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in interop in .NET 8 where custom marshallers with MarshalMode.ElementIn or MarshalMode.ElementOut now must have both managed-to-unmanaged and unmanaged-to-managed shapes.

breaks.title: SafeHandle types must have public constructor
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in interop in .NET 8 where SafeHandle-derived types used as 'ref' or 'out' parameters or as return types in 'LibraryImport' or 'GeneratedComInterface' methods must have a public constructor.

breaks.title: SendFile throws NotSupportedException for connectionless sockets
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in networking where the SendFile, SendFileAsync, and EndSendFile methods now throw a NotSupportedException for connectionless sockets on all platforms.

breaks.title: User info in `mailto:` URIs is compared
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in networking where URI comparison now considers user info for `mailto:` URIs.

breaks.title: IntPtr no longer used for function pointer types
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in .NET 8 SDK where System.Reflection uses a System.Type instance to represent a function pointer.

breaks.title: Architecture option doesn't imply self-contained
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where the `--arch` option no longer implies that an app is self-contained.

breaks.title: CLI console output uses UTF-8
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where the encoding for console input and output is now UTF-8.

breaks.title: SDK no longer changes console encoding after completion
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change where the .NET 8 SDK no longer changes the console encoding after running a command.

breaks.title: MSBuild custom derived build events deprecated
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in MSBuild where custom derived build events have been deprecated.

breaks.title: Setting DebugSymbols to false disables PDB generation
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in the .NET SDK where setting DebugSymbols to false disables PDB generation.

breaks.title: Containers default to use the 'latest' tag
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in containers where .NET SDK-built containers default to use the 'latest' tag instead of '$(Version)'.

breaks.title: 'dotnet list package' warns if source doesn't provide vulnerability data
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where 'dotnet list package --vulnerable' emits a warning when audit sources don't support VulnerabilityInfoResource.

breaks.title: SHA-1 fingerprint support deprecated in dotnet nuget sign
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where SHA-1 fingerprint support is deprecated in dotnet nuget sign command, promoting NU3043 warning to error.

breaks.title: 'dotnet pack' uses Release configuration
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where 'dotnet pack' uses the 'Release' configuration by default.

breaks.title: 'dotnet publish' uses Release configuration
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where 'dotnet publish' uses the 'Release' configuration by default.

breaks.title: 'dotnet restore' produces security vulnerability warnings
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where 'dotnet restore' produces security vulnerability warnings by default.

breaks.title: Duplicate output for -getItem, -getProperty, and -getTargetResult
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where using property, item, and result-returning MSBuild flags in combination with a framework-specific build causes duplicate output of the requested properties, items, and results.

breaks.title: Implicit `using` for System.Net.Http no longer added
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where an implicit global using directive for System.Net.Http is no longer added to .NET Framework projects.

breaks.title: MSBuild respects DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where MSBuild now respects the 'DOTNET_CLI_UI_LANGUAGE' environment variable.

breaks.title: .NET SDK uses a smaller RID graph
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where the SDK uses a smaller, portable RID graph for projects that target .NET 8 or later.

breaks.title: Runtime-specific apps no longer self-contained
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where apps that specify a runtime identifier are no longer self-contained by default.

breaks.title: Source Link included in the .NET SDK
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where Source Link is included, and commit information is included in InformationalVersion.

breaks.title: Trimming may not be used with .NET Standard or .NET Framework
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where trimming settings produce new warnings or errors in .NET Standard or .NET Framework projects.

breaks.title: Unlisted packages not installed by default for .NET tools
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where `dotnet tool install` no longer installs tools from unlisted versions of NuGet packages.

breaks.title: .user file imported in outer builds
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where the .user configuration file is now imported in outer builds.

breaks.title: Version requirements for .NET 8 SDK
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 8 SDK where specific versions of Visual Studio and MSBuild are required.

breaks.title: BinaryFormatter disabled across most project types
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in serialization where serialize and deserialize methods on BinaryFormatter now throw an exception at runtime.

breaks.title: Reflection-based deserializer resolves metadata eagerly
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in System.Text.Json serialization where the reflection-based deserializer resolves property metadata eagerly.

breaks.title: PublishedTrimmed projects fail reflection-based serialization
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in System.Text.Json serialization where projects with PublishTrimmed enabled now fail reflection-based serialization by default.

breaks.title: DateTimePicker.Text is empty string
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where the DateTimePicker.Text property is the empty string until a handle to the control is created.

breaks.title: DefaultValueAttribute removed from some properties
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where DefaultValueAttribute was removed from properties whose default values must be dynamically calculated.
affected_apis: The following table lists the affected properties.

breaks.title: WFDEV002 obsoletion is now an error
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where the compile-time diagnostic WFDEV002 has been promoted from a warning to an error.

breaks.title: ExceptionCollection constructor throws ArgumentException
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where the ExceptionCollection constructor now throws an exception if the input is not of type Exception.

breaks.title: System.Windows.Extensions doesn't reference System.Drawing.Common
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where the System.Windows.Extensions package no longer references System.Drawing.Common.

breaks.title: Top-level forms scale to DPI
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where top-level forms scale their minimum and maximum size values according to the DPI of the monitor.

breaks.title: ImageList.ColorDepth default is Depth32Bit
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where the default value of ImageList.ColorDepth has changed from Depth8Bit to Depth32Bit.

breaks.title: Certificates checked before loading remote images in PictureBox
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 9 breaking change in Windows Forms where WebClient checks certificates against the revocation list before loading remote images in a PictureBox control.

breaks.title: TableLayoutStyleCollection throws ArgumentException
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where inserting or removing an object that's not a TableLayoutStyle throws an exception.

breaks.title: Forms scale according to AutoScaleMode
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 for Windows Forms where top-level windows in PerMonitorV2-mode apps scale according to AutoScaleMode.
